BasicInfo.short: The Flow Integrated Media Group is a Hip Hop competition site with discussions, news, and events.

Products.description: MOB Card was added to CrunchBase in 2012

Products.name: BattleBoyz
Products.description: BattleBoyz is a microsite that is part of the Flowonline.com Hip Hop and Urban lifestyle network.

Products.name: FlowMusic
Products.description: FlowMusic allows TheFlowOnline.com members to post the music that they create for listening, free download or for sale.

Products.name: iTrakks
Products.description: iTrakks allow members who are producers and beat makers to post their pre-production music for sale.

Products.description: FlowStoppers is the model community for the Urban and Hip Hop model that tends to be curvier, more muscular, or more ethnic than mainstream

Products.description: TheFlowTV is a microsite of TheFlowOnline.com network that features Hip Hop and Urban music videos, animations, short films documentaries
